ctx: intros f g n x H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable n.

original: intros f g n x H1 H2. induction n. - apply I. - simpl in H2. simpl. apply Derive_n_ext_loc in H1. rewrite H1. apply continuity_pt_ext_loc in H1. apply Derive_n_correct in H2. apply (extension_cont_continuous (Derive g x) (Derive f x) x) in H1. + apply (extension_cont_continuous (Derive_n g n x) (Derive_n f n x) x) in H2.
